concept.title: Expand the data binding section in

conbody.p: To expand the Data Binding section, go to your test suite, click Show Data Binding. This feature help you bind the predefined test data files and manage variable binding with the Test Suite you want to run.
In the extended Data Binding section, there are two tables:

ul.li: Test Data: Specify here the data files for your test execution.
Variable Binding: This displays all variables of the selected test case. See also Test case Variables.
